Sentencas: This study reports a kind of single layer solid oxide fuel cell (SLSOFC) based on semiconductor-ionic conductor composite material which consists of Ce0.8Sm0.2O2-delta (SDC, ionic conductor), La0.25Sr0.75Ti1O3+delta (LST, n-type semiconductor) and Ni0.8Co0.15Al0.05LiO2-delta (NCAL, p-type semiconductor).
Titulo: Single layer low-temperature SOFC based on Ce0.8Sm0.2O2-δ- La0.25Sr0.75Ti1O3-δ- Ni0.8Co0.15Al0.05LiO2-δ composite material

Sentencas: It was found that the LST-SDC-NCAL composite based SLSOFC exhibited open circuit voltage (OCV) of more than 1 V and maximum power density of 222 mW cm(-2) under 550 degrees C. In-situ Schottky junction in the devicehelps to prevent short circuiting aswell as promote ion transport.
Titulo: Single layer low-temperature SOFC based on Ce0.8Sm0.2O2-δ- La0.25Sr0.75Ti1O3-δ- Ni0.8Co0.15Al0.05LiO2-δ composite material

Sentencas: Electrochemical impedance spectroscopy (EIS) analysis revealed that the ionic conductivity of the SLSOFC was about 0.09 S cm(-1), and the corresponding activation energy is 0.7 eV.
Titulo: Single layer low-temperature SOFC based on Ce0.8Sm0.2O2-δ- La0.25Sr0.75Ti1O3-δ- Ni0.8Co0.15Al0.05LiO2-δ composite material

Sentencas: The cell performance was stable during 65 h without any significant degradation.
Titulo: Single layer low-temperature SOFC based on Ce0.8Sm0.2O2-δ- La0.25Sr0.75Ti1O3-δ- Ni0.8Co0.15Al0.05LiO2-δ composite material

Sentencas: Moreover, the SLSOFC possessed higher tolerance for temperature change than traditional three-layer SOFC due to the well match of thermal expansion coefficient between electrodes and electrolyte.
Titulo: Single layer low-temperature SOFC based on Ce0.8Sm0.2O2-δ- La0.25Sr0.75Ti1O3-δ- Ni0.8Co0.15Al0.05LiO2-δ composite material

Sentencas: This device is of great significance in preventing fuel cell delamination, simplifying manufacturing process and promoting its commercialization.
Titulo: Single layer low-temperature SOFC based on Ce0.8Sm0.2O2-δ- La0.25Sr0.75Ti1O3-δ- Ni0.8Co0.15Al0.05LiO2-δ composite material
